snippet.title: Somber Echoes - Official Gameplay Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2024
snippet.description: Check out action-packed gameplay in this trailer for Somber Echoes, an upcoming Metroidvania sci-fi game that is coming to PC. Take the role of the resurrected Adrestia and embark on an epic journey to prevent your twin sister from unraveling the universe. Master acrobatic combat, explore the Greco-Roman space vessel Atromitos, and shape your destiny in Somber Echoes.
